subject: Steroids
Baseball
lead_paragraph: The Red Sox slugger David Ortiz said he had worked out with the controversial trainer Angel Presinal in the Dominican Republic, but he never saw anyone use performance-enhancing drugs there. Ortiz said he was not worried his name would be linked with others accused of steroid use.
